column4: Why is it I'm unable to get ubuntu to poke me about upgrading my mom's computer? I've tried update-manager -p and update-manager -c
ah. normal releases vs LTS. gotcha
something about Ibex - the upgrade tool prompted me to try the new fast-user-switch-applet - I turned it down at the time, is there a way to rerun that?
including creating the guest account and whatnot?
check your software sources and under updates / release upgrade choose the normal release
yeah, I'm straight on the difference now
